job.title: Help Desk Technician
job.description: pOur Client a national healthcare company is looking for people with outstandingnbspphonecommunication skills to work as part of their new digital support teamnbspthat will assist phlebotomists with any IT issues You willnbsptroubleshoot Level 1 over the phone andnbspoccasionallynbspin person as part of a 24x7 call centernbspThere could be some local travel You must be a US citizen and be able to pass a background check and drug testnbspppnbspppMust havespulliGreat Customer ServiceliliLevel 1 tech skillsliliWants to grow in techliliAble to remotely troubleshoot issuesliliPossible travelnbspupnbsptonbsp25 sonbspnbspmust have a vehicleliliRemote and NationwideliliWindows 7 and Windows 10 install and troubleshootingliliFamiliarity with help desk ticketing systemsliliFamiliarity with Active Directory and VPN big liliNetwork printer installation and configurationliliNetwork printer installation and configurationliul
